DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Spleen Tyrosine Kinase ( Syk ) Inhibitor , R935788 ( R788 ) dose 100 mg , tablet , orally , twice-a-day effective treatment Rheumatoid Arthritis patient 'failed ' biologic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study R935788 Tablets Treat Rheumatoid Arthritis ( Taski-3 )

Patients receive MTX must also receive folic folinic acid supplementation stable dose least 6 week prior Day 1 dosing .
